personalInfo.name: Aniruddha Teke
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in building modern, scalable web applications. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: Makers Tracker
projects.description: A project goal tracking tool for professionals. It let's you create project, assign goals and generate analytics to track progress

projects.title: Pricing Bees
projects.description: A no-code pricing page builder. Build professional-looking pricing pages, customize looks, and get detailed analytics to optimize your pricing strategy.

projects.title: Indie Hustles
projects.description: A listing site for Indie hackers to promote their products

keyResponsibilities: Led a team of developers to create scalable web applications.
Implemented CICD pipelines and Github actions to deploy the apps to production.
Developed front-end applications using React and Next.js.
Integrated third-party services and APIs to enhance application functionality.
Worked in AWS and Google cloud for the auth and storage management services.
Designed and developed web applications using JavaScript and React.
Built and maintained server-side APIs with Node.js and Express.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
Ensured applications are responsive and performant.
Participated in Agile ceremonies and contributed to project planning.

education.description: Completed a Degree specialization in EnTC, participated in extra curricular activities, got the GPA of 9.0 and become a bachlor.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Completed a comprehensive curriculum in computer science, including courses in data structures, algorithms, software engineering, and artificial intelligence. Worked on several projects, including a web application for managing student organizations and a mobile app for tracking fitness activities.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.title: Project Manager
testimonials.feedback: John is a fantastic developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His ability to solve complex problems is impressive.

testimonials.name: Mike Johnson
testimonials.title: CEO
testimonials.feedback: John is a highly skilled developer who brings a lot of value to our projects. His expertise in full stack development is top-notch.
